statements: DELETE FROM tournament_prizes WHERE prize_money = 1000.50 AND winner_id = 5;
DELETE FROM tournament_prizes WHERE winner_id = 100 AND tournament_id = 5;
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE player_id = '12c26f66-1b6d-4ded-a968-155c1058cc7b' AND reward_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM tournaments WHERE prize_pool < 50000 AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM players WHERE team_id = 2 AND earnings > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM reward WHERE amount > 1000 AND tournament_id = 1;
DELETE FROM prize_money WHERE prize_amount < 500 AND tournament_id = 2 OR player_id = 5;
